sources.title: Stories by Andre Cronje on Medium

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Aragon Association Dissolution The Aragon Association will dissolve itself, allow holders to redeem their ANT for ETH, and the Aragon project will focus on product development. WOOFi Pro Live Woofi launches WOOFi Pro, an orderbook-based perp dex with omnichain deposits, CEX-like UX, up to 20x leverage, and revenue share.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Aragon Association Dissolution, WOOFi Pro Live, Jupiter Launches Token, Fractional NFT Farming, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Onyx Exploited for $2.1M Lending protocol Onyx was exploited for ~$2.1M due to the same rounding issue behind the 7M Hundred Finance hack. SEC Charges SafeMoon The SEC charges two SafeMoon executives with fraud and unregistered offering of crypto securities. The arrested executives “withdrew crypto assets worth more than $200 million from the project, and misappropriated investor funds for personal use.”
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Onyx Exploited For 2.1M, SEC Charges SafeMoon, Hyperlane Supports Celestia Bridging, On-chain DCA, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: PancakeSwap Position Manager PancakeSwap launches Position Manager on V3, enabling automated LP, gas-free auto-compounding, and protocol & strategy integrations. Nomic BTC Live on Osmosis & Kujira Bitcoin bridge L1 Nomic launches nBTC on Osmosis and Kujira.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - PancakeSwap Position Manager, Nomic BTC Live on Osmosis & Kujira, WalletConnect Bans Ukraine and Russia, Extra Yield on Staked ETH, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Unibot Exploited for 450 ETH Unibot experienced a token approval exploit and the team has halted the protocol. The exploiter transfers meme coins from users and exchanges them for ETH, so far the exploit size is ~450 ETH. Avalanche Snowtrace Discontinuing
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Unibot Exploited for 450 ETH, Proposal to Activate ARB Staking, Perennial Trigger Orders, On-chain Dual Investments, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.title: Last Week in DeFi - Arbitrum Orbit Mainnet Ready, IndexCoop cdETI Live, Astrid Exploit, Poolshark Beta-2 Live, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Polygon POL Live on Ethereum Polygon 2.0 token POL contracts are deployed on the Ethereum mainnet. Kava One-Click Bridging Kava launches a one-click bridge solution, enabling $USDT transfers across Kava EVM, Kava IBC, and Injective. Swell Super swETH
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Polygon POL Live, Kava One-Click Bridging, Swell Rewards stETH Deposits, Wallet Airdrop, Lower Risk Options, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Maestro Router Exploit Maestro Router was compromised. The team has identified the exploit and resumed trading, but tokens with pools on certain dexes will be temporarily unavailable. Earlier the team promised that affected users would be fully refunded (~280ETH in total).
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Maestro Router Exploit, dydx Chain Live, Astrid Mainnet Live, Stable Yields, Token Buybacks, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: BTC ETF Progress Blackrock's iShares Bitcoin Trust has been listed on the DTCC (Depository Trust & Clearing Corporation, which clears NASDAQ trades). The ticker will be $IBTC. Blackrock is also looking to seed the ETF, this usually happens when ETFs are preparing to launch.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - BTC ETF progress, Sushi Cross-chain Swaps Live, DCA with Cowswap, IDO Premining, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.title: Last Week in DeFi - Yearn veYFI Live, Notional v3 Public Soon, 1inch Considers Ladder Buying ETH, AAVE AURA Token Swap, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Aave Token Swap Aave now allows traders to swap tokens directly on the website. IndexCoop x eToro eToro partners with IndexCoop to launch Web3 Smart Portfolio. The portfolio – ‘Index-Coop’ – will cover four key sectors: Bitcoin, Ethereum, DeFi, and the Metaverse.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Token Swaps on Aave, IndexCoop Works with eToro, Bitcoin Spot ETFs In Review, Liquidation-free Loans, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Rysk Atomic Credit Spreads Rysk launches Atomic Credit Spreads, an options strategy involving selling and buying options contracts with 10x capital efficiency. Angle x Unblock Angle protocol partners with Unblock, enabling users to buy and sell agEUR (Euro-pegged stablecoin) with fiat using bank transfers.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Trade Credit Spreads, Angle Gets Euro On-ramp, Polkadot Mass Layoffs, Volatility Trading Made Easy, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Myso V2 Live Lending protocol Myso launches V2 on Ethereum. V2 enables liquidation-free borrowing, more asset supports, customizable loan terms, and leverage Fantom Foundation Wallet Exploit Fantom Foundation wallets have been drained and lost at least 7M. Core dev Andrew Cronje claims that "All foundation funds are secured. A fantom employee however was targeted in an attack and their personal funds were stolen”.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Liquidation Free Lending, Fantom Foundation Wallet Exploit, Volatility Market on Testnet, Airdrop on L2 Testnet, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Uniswap Interface Fee Uniswap will impose a 0.15% fee starting Tuesday on trades of ETH, USDC, WETH, USDT, DAI, WBTC, agEUR, GUSD, LUSD, EUROC, and XSGD. Proposal: AAVE AURA Exchange Aura community proposes to collaborate with Aave with a token exchange. The deal is to swap 238,544 AURA (~$200,000) for 2,965.35 AAVE.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Uniswap Interface Fee, Aave-Aura Token Exchange, Rabby Desktop Live, Margin Trading on Osmosis, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.title: Last Week in DeFi - Greyscale Ready to Convert GBTC, Arbitrum STIP Cutoff, Lido Simple DVT, zkSync txBridge Live, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Platypus 2.2M Exploit Platypus on Avalanche experienced a flash loan hack and lost 2.2 million. The team is investigating and the liquidity pools have been temporarily halted. IPOR V2 Live Lending IPOR launches V2. New upgrades include Custom APRs with zaps, $stETH pool, 90d swaps, a new architecture, and updated UX/UI.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Platypus $2.2M Exploit, IPOR V2 Live, On-Chain Limit Orders, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Frax sFRAX Live Frax Finance launches sFRAX. Users are able to stake their FRAX and earn Tbill yield on it, similar to $DAI's DSR. Yield is at ~10%. Tangible USDR Depegs Tangible’s liquid $DAI from the $USDR treasury was redeemed and caused an accelerated drawdown in the market cap, leading to the USDR de-pegging.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Frax sFRAX Live, Tangible USDR Depegs, Mars V2 Live, Farming Airdrop on New EVM Chain, and more...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.title: Last Week in DeFi - InsurAce V2, Scroll L2 Mainnet, FTX Exploiter Attacks, Frax V3 Soon, and More...

articles.author: 𝕯𝖆𝖓𝖌𝖊𝖗
articles.description: Perennial V2 on Arbitrum Arbitrum-based derivatives AMM Perennial launches V2 with a faster oracle, cheaper fees, deeper liquidity, and improved risk management. VNX on Avalanche RWA protocol VNX launches VEUR and VCHF on Avalanche, allowing users to access European fiat currencies on-chain.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Perennial V2 Live,FX Trading on Avalanche, Stable Yields, and more...
